full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SDOM PA NYI SHU PA SOGS KYI MCHAN  'GREL DANG BCAS PA'I BYANG SEMS KYI BSLAB BYA MDOR BSDUS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES PA 'DI YANG DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD @010B YANGS PA'I RGYAL RONG DGE SLONG BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS NAS SNGA PHYIR BSKUL ZHING RANG NYID LA'ANG TSIG GAM BRJED BYANG DU PHAN RER DAD PA MKHAN PO'I MING CAN GYIS RA SA SPANG LUNG RI KHROD DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DAD 'DUN SHES RAB YANGS PA'I CHOS MDZAD BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS SO,,) ` ,,RNAM DAG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I TSUL KHRIMS KYI, ,RNAM BSHAD RJE BTZUN BLA MA'I GSUNG GSANG 'DI, ,MANG THOS BSHES GNYEN NGAG DBANG CHOS 'DZIN NAS, ,GZHAN LA SMAN PA'I THUGS BSKYED BZANG PO YIS, ,PAR DU BSKRUN CING MKHAN MING GRAGS PAS KYANG, ,SGO GSUM MTHUN PAR 'BAD PA'I DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,SKYE KUN RGYAL SRAS SPYOD DANG MI 'BRAL ZHING, ,RING MIN SKU BZHI'I SA LA REG GYUR CIG ,DZA YANTU,, ,,)
